meanings.definition: The act of removing or masking unpleasant odors.
meanings.sent1: The deodorization of the room made it much more pleasant to be in.
meanings.sent2: Proper deodorization is essential in a gym to keep it smelling fresh.
meanings.sent3: The deodorization of the old shoes was like a breath of fresh air.
meanings.sent4: Her deodorization of the kitchen was like a magic spell against bad smells.
meanings.sent5: The deodorization of the garbage bin was a game-changer in the fight against odors.

meanings.definition: The process of neutralizing or eliminating bad smells.
meanings.sent1: The deodorization of the carpet removed the pet odor completely.
meanings.sent2: Regular deodorization of the fridge keeps food from absorbing unwanted smells.
meanings.sent3: The deodorization of the locker room was a team effort to combat the stench.
meanings.sent4: His deodorization of the bathroom was like a superhero saving the day from bad odors.
meanings.sent5: The deodorization of the car was a breath of fresh air after weeks of neglect.

meanings.definition: Making something smell better by removing or covering up bad odors.
meanings.sent1: She deodorized the room before the guests arrived.
meanings.sent2: The cleaning crew deodorized the hotel lobby every morning.
meanings.sent3: He deodorized his gym bag by washing it with a special detergent.
meanings.sent4: The scented candles deodorized the living room after cooking fish.
meanings.sent5: The air freshener spray quickly deodorized the musty closet.
